briefdescription.para: select actions to use when targeting
target another unit or a position
sets invoked ability type, no other type may be used if this gets set

parameterdescription.para: allows a specific ability type to be used for example to set a unit to patrol rather than the default move

briefdescription.para: restricts action to a set of possible ability types
the ability types allowed to use this command
add addition option to this command
